display-type.tooltip: Note that the visual representation will only work if your panel is large enough to display it properly, otherwise the simple style will be used.

show-window-icons.tooltip: Display window icon in the center of its window representation when space allows.

window-icon-size.tooltip: Icons may appear blurry due to scaling. If an icon is too large relative to the window representation, it may not be displayed at all.

scroll-behavior.tooltip: Reverse or disable the direction of the scroll in the workspace list.
